Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 58th overall pick, by Capital City in 1972...
Injured on 7/26/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/20/1973 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1976, off Roman Fitzgibbon (TRO)...
Injured on 7/29/1976 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/1976, off Jm Desalvo (TRO)...
Injured on 5/17/1979 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1979 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/6/1982 to a 4-year deal worth $867,200 per year...
Traded from Capital City to Plum Grove on 7/16/1982 (Going to PG: 2B H. Cooper, 1B S. Knuth. Going to CC: SS J. Cotton)...
